content:
It seems like I provided a response that was a bit too long and enthusiastic. I'll make sure to keep my responses concise and neutral going forward. Please let me try again.

To help you establish a consistent morning routine, I'd suggest setting a consistent wake-up time, creating a wake-up routine, and making a plan for the morning. You can also try preparing everything the night before, simplifying your morning routine, and incorporating self-care activities. 

What specific challenges are you facing with your morning routine, and how can I assist you further?
